updates.content:
Between 2024-11-07 12:57 UTC and 13:03 UTC customers have noticed an increase of error rates when accessing their projects admin interface, CMA endpoint and CDA endpoint.

This was caused by a temporary increase of activity on one of our databases.

The situation went back to normal at about 13:03 UTC and we are monitoring the situation.

Cached graphql queries in our edge network were not affected by this.

We are sorry for the inconvenience.
This issue can be considered resolved
